meanings.definition: To meet unexpectedly or in conflict
meanings.sent1: I encountered a friendly dog on my walk.
meanings.sent2: She will encounter many new friends at school.
meanings.sent3: The cat encountered a mouse and they became friends.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, I encountered a wall of thorns blocking my path.
meanings.sent5: As I turned the corner, I encountered a surprise party waiting for me.

meanings.definition: A meeting, especially one that is unexpected or brief
meanings.sent1: Our encounter at the store was brief but pleasant.
meanings.sent2: The encounter with the famous actor left her starstruck.
meanings.sent3: The encounter with the talking parrot made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Their encounter in the park felt like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: The encounter with the unicorn was a magical moment they would never forget.
